.. py:class:: MyFormatter(prog, indent_increment=2, max_help_position=24, width=None)

   Bases: :class:`argparse.RawTextHelpFormatter`, :class:`argparse.ArgumentDefaultsHelpFormatter`

   Help message formatter which retains formatting of all help text.

   Only the name of this class is considered a public API. All the methods
   provided by the class are considered an implementation detail.


.. function:: format_helptext(text)

   Format help text, including wrapping.


.. function:: append_file(files_created, tag, filename)


.. function:: process_event(event, outdir, pcommands, config, input_directory, process_tag, files_created, output_format, status, recompute_metrics, export_dir=None)
